drawback.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a disadvantage of a situation, plan, product etc
drawback.translation[0].definitions[0].e: It’s a great city – the only drawback is the weather.
The main drawback to these products is that they tend to be too salty.
drawback.translation[1].definitions[0].d: a disadvantage of a situation, product etc that makes it less attractive
drawback.translation[1].definitions[0].e: There are drawbacks to being a sole trader, but they are outweighed by the benefits.
one of the main drawbacks of the scheme
